story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_0100:
We’ve heard that Mewtwo was last seen
heading deep into this forest.
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_0200: Red and Blue are searching for it, so we should—
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_0500:
We’re not gonna let you get in the way of our
boss’s magnificent schemes!
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_0600:
Don’t think we’ll go easy on ya just ’cause you’re
tiny little brats!
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_0700:
These two look a bit stronger than the last ones
we took down...
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_0800:
I can tell there are more hiding in the trees around
us, too. They just haven’t shown themselves yet.
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_0900: I can take care of these two!
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_1000:
I’ll help you, too! I can’t always be the one
being protected!
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_1100: Thanks! Then we’ll leave them to you.
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_1200: Aw, we gotta fight the little brats, huh?
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_1300:
I’m gonna teach you a lesson about our boss, the
great Giovanni!
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_1400:
Just you wait, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
I’m gonna get stronger.
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_1500:
Even if it means I have to learn from my enemies
during this battle!
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_1600:
No... I was too weak, and now I’ve only become
a burden to the boss!
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_1700:
I wasn’t expecting you little twerps to have this
much fight in you...
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_1900:
They were strong. I guess even in organizations
like Team Rocket, you get all sorts of people.
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_2000: Um...Misty, Erika? We finished our battle!
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_2300:
Misty and Erika took down all those grunts?! But
there were so many of them!
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_2400: That’s incredible... Gym Leaders sure are strong.
story_teamrocket_01_22000/2401_1201_2600: You all did well. Shall we continue our search?
